definition: school/sect/purpose/model/ancestor/clan/to take as one's model (in academic or artistic work)/classifier for batches, items, cases (medical or legal), reservoirs

sentences.english: Respectfully requests, and praying fathers come to enjoy the family size peace, prosperity.
sentences.chinese: 恭請祖宗降臨享用，並祈保合家大小平安，興旺發達。

sentences.english: Your method is against the domestic disciplines made by our forefathers.
sentences.chinese: 你的這種做法是有悖於祖宗家法的。

sentences.english: What each group inherits will be according to the names for its ancestral tribe.
sentences.chinese: 他們要按者祖宗各支派的名字承受爲業。

sentences.english: For doctors, this is the granddaddy of them all.
sentences.chinese: 治療方案就是這些醫生的祖宗。

sentences.english: Your fathers did eat manna in the wilderness, and are dead.
sentences.chinese: 你們的祖宗在曠野喫過嗎哪，還是死了。

sentences.english: After worshiping the ancestors (on one day), he gave a jug of libation to the servants who helped him.
sentences.chinese: 祭過祖宗以後，他把一壺祭酒賞給幫忙的僕人。

sentences.english: 49Your forefathers ate the manna in the desert, yet they died.
sentences.chinese: 你們的祖宗在曠野喫過嗎哪，還是死了。

sentences.english: The forgotten ancestor to theater televisions, RPTVs still have a lot to offer consumers.
sentences.chinese: 劇場電視被人遺忘的祖宗，背投電視仍然拿得出手。

sentences.english: When your fathers tempted me, proved me, and saw my work.
sentences.chinese: 那時你們的祖宗試我探我，並且觀看我的作爲。

sentences.english: During the festival the investor investigated his ancestor.
sentences.chinese: 節日期間投資者調查了他的祖宗。

sentences.english: Now this problem appears, we should go to our ancestors.
sentences.chinese: 現在這個問題出現的時候，要去問老祖宗。

sentences.english: For that is how their fathers treated the prophets.
sentences.chinese: 他們的祖宗待先知也是這樣。

sentences.english: The third point is the story about ancestors of Canton closes to local people's life.
sentences.chinese: 最貼近廣州人，講本土老祖宗的故事。

sentences.english: He shall go to the generation of his fathers; they shall never see light.
sentences.chinese: 他仍必歸到他歷代的祖宗那裏，永不見光。

sentences.english: Fill ye up then the measure of your fathers.
sentences.chinese: 你們去充滿你們祖宗的惡貫吧。

sentences.english: The villagers still follow the customs of their ancestors.
sentences.chinese: 與祖先有關的，祖宗傳下的。

definition: to recount history but omit one's ancestors (idiom); to forget one's roots
offspring/future generations/younger generation of a family/junior members of a group
